explanation:
code_hardening: No additional null or format checks were added; the function preserves the original assumptions about persisted values and defaults.
resolve_compilation_errors: The method signature and field references were adapted to the existing TimePreference class so it compiles correctly; no new APIs were required.
exception_handling: No try/catch blocks were introduced; Integer.parseInt behavior remains unchanged to match the original logic.
logic_customization: The logic is identical to the Stack Overflow snippet and matches the existing preference semantics, including the "00:00" default and restoreValue handling.
refactoring: Minor cleanup was applied by removing a duplicate semicolon and normalizing local variable initialization without changing behavior.
misc: Formatting was aligned with the surrounding class style; no logging or additional comments were added.
